extendedInfo.description: With the DU University College Mobile app, you can now access your class information and engage with your classmates anytime, anywhere.Activity â Quickly view the recent activity from your courses, including thread topics and responses, dropbox submissions, and gradesUpcoming â See scheduled items from your courses, including threads, content items, quizzes and examsDiscussions â Read thread topics and respond to your instructor or classmatesAnnouncements â Quickly see what is happening in your coursesGradebook â View grades and comments on your assignmentsPeople â Easy access to others in your course

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: I can\'t even figure out how to sign in. What the hell username are you asking for? This is ridiculous.
reviews.author: Kiara Vann

reviews.title: Handy
reviews.comment: Great for checking on forum posts and grades on the go. Not so good for looking at homework. No access to doc sharing, or normal teacher assignments or readings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great when it works but rarely does
reviews.author: A Google User
